predicate.note: Frames file for 'skate' based on sentences in ULA Spoken. Verbnet entry 51.4.1.

roleset.name: move on, or as if on, skates

example.name: usually intransitive
example.text: And we could skate to the movie or ride a bicycle to the movie.

example.name: with Arg 1
example.text: Mary skates home from work at the drive-in.
